document.full_text: the iowa senate will consider a bill that bans abortions after the 20th week of pregnancy, following approval of the measure by the state house thursday night, lawmakers said friday.
document.title: iowa house bans abortion after 20th week of pregnancy
lines_and_colors: the iowa senate will consider a bill that bans abortions after the 20th week of pregnancy, following approval of the measure by the state house thursday night, lawmakers said friday.
